cu.explanation_en: Setting SCTP_INSTREAMS to 0 will cause invalid SCTP stream configuration and F1 interface connection failures.

du.explanation_en: Setting dl_frequencyBand to 999 (invalid value) will cause frequency band configuration errors and downlink transmission failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將 dl_frequencyBand 設定為 999（無效值）會導致頻率帶配置錯誤和下行鏈路傳輸失敗。
